features: DYNAMIC DUO. Transform your skin with the powerful combination of hyaluronic acid and a vitamin complex in this facial toner. This dynamic duo provides essential hydration and brightening benefits to reduce the appearance of fine lines and aging.

ULTIMATE HYDRATION. Indulge in the ultimate hydration experience with the benefits of our face toner. The hyaluronic acid deeply moisturizes the skin without any tightness. Revel in refreshed and revitalized skin that is left feeling soft, supple, and radiant.

FRESH VITALITY. Elevate your skincare routine with the fermented blend of 7 vitamins in this Korean toner that provides your skin with fresh vitality. The revitalizing vitamin complex smooths and cleanses the skin, while the brightening effect of the 7 vitamins create an even complexion.

EFFORTLESS GLOW. Enjoy supple and hydrated skin with the effortless glow from this skin toner, enriched with PHA (gluconolactone) to reveal silky-smooth and transparent skin. Its powerful formula effectively eliminates skin impurities that results in a radiant and natural-looking complexion.

WATER-LIKE TEXTURE. Experience the ultimate refreshment with our moisturizing toner. The transparent and water-like texture provides a fresh finish that revitalizes and rejuvenates your skin. Enjoy a surge of nourishing hydration without any stickiness or greasy residue.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What are the key benefits? Moisturizes and Nourishes Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid, this potent ingredient provides both moisturizing and nourishing benefits to your skin without any discomfort Hydrates and Brightens The combined power of Hyaluronic Acid and Vitamin Complex provides essential hydrating and brightening benefits to visibly reduce wrinkles and revitalize your skin. Exfoliates Enriched with PHA (gluconolactone), this powerful formula effectively eliminates skin impurities to reveal silky-smooth and naturally glowing skin.
Free from 10 harmful substances Free of synthetic scents & colors Watery

Tips to Maximize EffectsExfoliating Toner Wet a cotton pad with the toner then wipe along the texture of your skin first. Then apply, multiple times as an overcoat. Maximum Moisturization Pack Put an appropriate amount on 4-6 cotton pads and place them on areas to maximize moisture and strengthen the skin barrier Better Absorption When applying the toner by hand, warm up your clean hands by rubbing them then slowly press your face with the heat generated from your palms while providing a little pressure to improve absorption and adhesion. and uneven skin tone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: I have pretty sensitive skin so I avoid AHAs and BHAs, but have milia and dark circles so i wanyed some exfoliation and brightening. This toner has never made my skin react and has made it feel soft and is slowly reducing pore size and milia. I think it's one of my favorite products and more people need to know about it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my 3rd bottle and it is soft and not oily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a really wonderful hyaluronic acid toner. It came nicely packaged, in a bottle that is somewhat similar to a high end toner that I used to know. So far, this toner is working far better on my skin than many toners I've used. It's clear and virtually fragrance free (there is a slight scent that dissipates on application).When applied with a cotton pad, the toner goes on smooth and does not leave a sticky residue. Instead it leaves skin feeling soft and refreshed; not tight or stripped of its natural oils either.They're also not kidding when they say that this product is exfoliating! I had a mildly flaky area on my chin, so I was thinking that I needed to exfoliate, but this toner did the job all by iteself! It left the skin smooth and irritation free. It's a very soothing experience. Additionally, the more you use the product, the softer your skin feels! I rubbed a few drops on my hands and pressed them into my face and that did seal in extra moisture. You can tells this toner is hyaluronic acid based. I just love it!As for the skin plumping, I didn't see any difference immediately after I used the toner, BUT I noticed a difference as soon as I applied my moisturizers. They went on extra silky and I could see a difference in smoother, even plumper skin that was really well primed for foundation. Reaaally Great!I'm going to store this in the fridge for that extra spa-like effect! A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells Lightly of Citrus with Flintstone Vitamins
reviews.reviewText: IT'S SKIN V7 Hyaluronic Toner | Hyaluronic Acid Toner for Face w/PHA & 7 Types of Vitamins | Korean Skin Care Toner for Dry Skin | Hydrating Toner for Face Skin Care (Pack of 1, 5.07 Fl oz.)Hydrating toner in cute packaging for everyday use. I’ve always done the Korean multi step skincare, and this product fits right after cleansing. Before applying all the serum and moisturizer.Includes:- Hyaluronic acid: for moisturizing- PHA (gluconolactone): for exfoliation- 7 Vitamin Complex: B1 Thiamine HCI, B2 Riboflavin, B3 Niacinamide, B5 Pantothenic Acid, B6 Pyridoxine, B9 Folic Acid, and B12 Cyanocobalamine. Not sure how it exactly works, but I’m assuming it’s what giving this product that Flintstone vitamin scent.- Free from 10 harmful substances- Free of synthetic scents & colorsInstructions:- Toner: Wet a cotton pad with product, then wipe along the skin. Reapply as needed- Maximize Moisturizing Effect (like a face mask): Wet 4-6 cotton pads, place on areas as needed- Better Absorption: When applying by hand, warm up your clean hands first. Then apply product to hands and slowly press your face with the heat generated from your palms. Apply light pressure to improve absorption.For now, I feel the extra bit of hydration. Since it is replacing my previous product, I would say equivalent moisturizing effect as a product 20x the cost. It’s a clean feeling product, and there’s no tightness afterwards. Product has not been sitting on a shelf for months, and plenty of time per expiration stamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don’t like the scent
reviews.reviewText: When I try this cleanser the smell puts me off to it. To me it smells like fruity pebbles which in turns makes me feel like I’m just smearing cereal on my face. It feels nice like any other cleanser but I can’t get over the scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good basic moisturizing toner that absorbs well
reviews.reviewText: I liked this, but it's not my favorite toner I have tried from the It's Skin brand. It's watery in texture and absorbs really quickly. It leaves skin feeling comfortable, even without wearing moisturizer. The skin feels supple after applying this and it provides a slight glow. If you are someone who doesn't want evidence of your skincare products after applying them, you'll love this. Personally I prefer the Nutrition Toner from their collagen line. That makes my skin feel full and plump. It's really just what you prefer. Smell wise, this had a vitamin smell and reminded me of those Emergen-C drink packets if you have ever tried those. I don't apply toner with a cotton pad because I think that wastes a ton of product. Instead I apply with my bare hands and pat the product into my face. I liked this, but it didn't blow me away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toner is amazing smells good and works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Takes care of dry patches
reviews.reviewText: I like this toner for summertime as my skin is often drier than normal. It evens out my skin tone and hydrates. My skin looks plumper and no dry patches.
